name: MLGazetteer.ModelParameters
desc: The parameters that configure a gazetteer.

items.name: init(language: NLLanguage?)
items.desc: Creates a new set of gazetteer parameters.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the gazetteer settings.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the gazetteer settings that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the gazetteer settings shown in a playground.
